item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-108
item.description: US-395 North approaching CA-108 - Mono County.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-108
item.description: US-395 North approaching CA-108/Sonora. Sonora Pass was closed when this picture was taken.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north. Distance to Sonora Jct. - CA-108, Walker, and Reno (Nevada). Begin scenic route.

item.title: US-395 South - Sierra Pass Information
item.description: Sierra pass closure information on US-395 south. Information for Sonora Pass (CA-108) and Tioga Pass (CA-120). At the time this photo was taken both passes were open.

item.title: CA-108/CA-120 East at CA-120
item.description: CA-108/CA-120 East at CA-120 junction in Tuolumne County.

item.title: CA-108/CA-120 East at CA-120
item.description: CA-108/CA-120 East at CA-120 east to Groveland, Yosemite, and Chinese Camp. Continue east on CA-108 for Sonora.

item.title: CA-120 East at CA-108
item.description: CA-120 east at CA-108 in Oakdale. Turn right for CA-108 west to Modesto. Turn left for CA-108/CA-120 east to Sonora and Yosemite. CA-120 joins CA-108 eastbound to the Chinese Camp area.

item.title: US-395 North - Sierra Nevada Pass Information
item.description: Sierra Nevada mountain pass information on US-395 north. This sign shows the status of CA-120 (Tioga Pass), CA-108 (Sonora Pass), and CA-89 (Monitor Pass). At the time this picture was taken, the only pass still closed was Tioga Pass.
